reason: Robust institutional engagement (DTCC, Goldman Sachs) underpins long-term bullish sentiment and adoption, suggesting a significant inflow of capital. However, immediate market action is complicated by intense regulatory scrutiny, ongoing legislative efforts, and industry disagreements (Coinbase vs. tokenization firms), creating substantial short-term volatility and uncertainty. This necessitates a cautious, observational stance while smart money accumulates.
headlines: Tokenization firms reject Coinbase's crypto bill equities claims
Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong says company opposed crypto bill to protect consumers
DTCC aiming to make all 1.4 million securities in its custody digitally eligible
Senate Democrats pursuing a Friday call with crypto industry on market structure bill
Goldman is 'spending a lot of time' on crypto, prediction markets efforts, CEO Solomon says
